Module kivakit.core.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.kernel.messaging.repeaters

Interface RepeaterTrait

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Broadcaster, Listener, NamedObject, Receiver<Transmittable>, Repeater, Trait, Transceiver, Transmitter<Transmittable>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseObjectReader
    public interface RepeaterTrait
extends Trait, Repeater
    A stateful Trait that can be used when a class can't extend BaseRepeater to implement the Repeater interface.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    Trait

      • addListener

        default void addListener​(Listener listener,
                         Filter<Transmittable> filter)
        Description copied from interface: Broadcaster
        Adds a listener to this broadcaster that wants to receive future messages. This is the mirror method of Listener.listenTo(Broadcaster) as both methods achieve the same thing.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface Broadcaster
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to broadcast to. Implementations should ignore null listeners.
